title: Gas Emergency Response Plan Drill
description: A compliance officer is simulating a pipeline rupture to drill the company's emergency response plan.

tasks.description: Initiate the drill by simulating a pressure drop alarm on a major pipeline.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system logs the simulated alarm and notifies the on-call operator.

tasks.description: Track the response time for the operator to acknowledge the alarm and initiate the shutdown procedure.
tasks.expected_outcome: System logs the time taken for each step of the response.

tasks.description: Verify that the operator correctly identifies which valves to close to isolate the simulated rupture.
tasks.expected_outcome: System confirms the operator selected the correct valves according to the plan.

tasks.description: Generate a drill performance report highlighting successes and areas for improvement.
tasks.expected_outcome: System produces a formal report on the drill.
